body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting XYZ Hotel Customer Support. My name is John Miller. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Teresa. Can I get your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is t.peterson@example.com and my phone number is five five five, two three four, nine eight seven six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Teresa. We'll make sure to update your contact information. Can you also provide your date of birth and postal code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. My date of birth is the eleventh of April, one nine eight seven, and my postal code is one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Appreciate your cooperation, Teresa. Thank you for providing the information. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. I'm feeling excited for my upcoming stay at XYZ Hotel!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's wonderful to hear, Teresa. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time today. Have a great day!
